lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the victory by the United States over Europe in the Ryder Cup misspelled, in some editions, the surname of a referee on the golf course on Sunday. He is John Paramor, not Paramour.
snippet: An article on Monday about the victory by the United States over Europe in the Ryder Cup misspelled, in some editions, the surname of a referee on the golf course on Sunday. He is John Paramor, not Paramour.
